actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to accelerate the implementation of the existing tax on ozone-depleting chemicals and to provide that such tax shall apply to certain hydrochloroflurocarbons.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the base tax amount on ozone-depleting chemicals. Imposes an additional tax on the sale or use of such chemicals after 1992. Eliminates: (1) the scheduled phase-in of such tax rates; and (2) the different rates for initially listed chemicals and newly listed chemicals. Repeals the phase-in of such tax on certain substances. Makes certain hydrochlorofluorocarbons (HCFCs) subject to the tax on ozone-depleting chemicals at 50 percent of the base rate. Imposes a new floor stock tax on ozone-depleting chemicals and repeals the existing floor stocks tax.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to accelerate the implementation of the existing tax on ozone-depleting chemicals and to provide that such tax shall apply to certain hydrochloroflurocarbons.
